name: Kozmo Dark Destroyer
effectText: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower "Kozmo" monster from your Deck.
